doc.description: A set of messages which can be generated by the compatability functions in the base library.

message.name: Unsupported
message.arg: The name of the feature which is not supported

doc.description: An attempt was made to use an unsupported feature.
doc.action: Internal error: use this feature not available on this platform. Notify support@isode.com

message.name: Nomem
message.arg: The number of bytes of memory attempted to be allocated

doc.description: Memory allocation failure (out of memory)
doc.action: May be a resource error. If error repeats, investigate system resource issue or configuration error

message.name: stat
message.arg: The name of the file (if available)

doc.description: An attempt was made to get details on a file, which failed.
doc.action: Check the permissions on the file

message.name: Lseek
message.text: Failed to move position in file %1
message.arg: The name of the file (if available)

doc.description: An attempt was made to move the read/write position in the file, which failed.
doc.action: Check the permissions on the file

message.name: read
message.arg: The name of the file (if available)

doc.description: An attempt was made to read the file, which failed.
doc.action: Check the permissions on the file

message.name: lock
message.arg: The name of the file (if available)

doc.description: An attempt was made to lock a file, which failed.
doc.action: May be a resource error. If error repeats, investigate system resource issue or configuration error

doc.description: An attempt was made to unlock a file, which failed.
doc.action: May be a resource error. If error repeats, investigate system resource issue or configuration error

message.name: gethandle
message.text: Failed to get file system handle

doc.description: (Windows only) An attempt was made to get the handle to the file from the file descriptor, which failed. This can occur when mapping a file. The cause is likely to be an invalid file descriptor.
doc.action: May be a resource error. If error repeats, investigate system resource issue or configuration error

doc.description: (Windows only) An attempt was made to create a file mapping to a file, and this failed.
doc.action: May be a resource error. If error repeats, investigate system resource issue or configuration error

message.name: MapViewOfFile
message.text: Failed to create mapping to file

doc.description: (Windows only) An attempt was made to map part of a file into memory, and this failed.
doc.action: May be a resource error. If error repeats, investigate system resource issue or configuration error

message.name: UnMapViewOfFile
message.text: Failed to remove mapping to file

doc.description: (Windows only) An attempt was made to remove the mapping into memory of a file, and this failed.
doc.action: May be a resource error. If error repeats, investigate system resource issue or configuration error

doc.description: (Unix only) An attempt to map a file into memory failed.
doc.action: May be a resource error. If error repeats, investigate system resource issue or configuration error

doc.description: (Unix only) An attempt to remove the mapping of a file into memory failed.
doc.action: May be a resource error. If error repeats, investigate system resource issue or configuration error

doc.description: Cannot remove file.
doc.action: Check permissions and ownership of the file

doc.description: Cannot remove directory.
doc.action: Check permissions and ownership of the directory, and that it is empty.

doc.description: Cannot create directory.
doc.action: Check permissions and ownership of the directory in which you are creating the new directory.

doc.description: Cannot open directory.
doc.action: Check permissions and ownership of the directory.

doc.description: Cannot read directory.
doc.action: Check permissions and ownership of the directory.

doc.description: Cannot open file.
doc.action: Check permissions and ownership of the file and directory.

message.name: chdir
message.text: Failed to change current working directory to %1

doc.description: Cannot change directory to the given directory.
doc.action: Check permissions and ownership of the directory, and that it exists.

doc.description: An error occurred writing to the file. There can be a number of reasons for this, such as disk failure, or the disk being full.
doc.action: Check the system error.

message.name: renamefile
message.arg: The original name of the file
The proposed new name of the file

doc.description: An error occurred attempting to rename a file.
doc.action: Check the system error.

doc.description: An error occurred closing the file. There can be a number of reasons for this, such as disk failure, or the disk being full.
doc.action: Check the system error.

message.name: zero_length
message.text: Cannot map file %1 which is has zero length
message.arg: The name of the file (if available)

doc.description: An attempt was made to map a file which has zero length
doc.action: Check if the file should is empty. If the error persists Notify support@isode.com

message.name: lock_unsupported
message.arg: The integer corresponding to the configured locking style
message.text: Specified style of locking (%1) is not supported

doc.description: The configured locking style is not supported on this platform.
doc.action: Configuration eror. Reconfigure the locking to use a style which is supported

doc.description: An attempt was made to generate a temporary filename which is too long.
doc.action: Check that the directory used for the temporary files is not too long

doc.description: An attempt was made to open a temporary file, which failed.
doc.action: May be resource or configuration error. Check that the directory configured for temporary files exists.

message.name: tmperrors
message.text: Too many errors creating temporary file

doc.description: An attempt was made to create a temporary file, but there were too many errors in the multiple attempts.
doc.action: Check the number of files in the temporary directory, and the permissions on this directory. May be a resource error. If error repeats, investigate system resource issue or configuration error

message.name: tmpbufsize
message.text: Buffer for temporary filename is too short

doc.description: A temporary file has been opened, but the buffer provided by the caller is too short.
doc.action: This is an internal error. Supply a buffer for the longest possible pathname. Notify support@isode.com

message.name: mmapmode
message.arg: The numeric value for the access mode

doc.description: An attempt was made to memory map a file. The provided access mode is not known.
doc.action: Programmer error; pass a valid disposition to isode_mmap() Notify support@isode.com

message.name: mmapdisposition
message.arg: The numeric value for the disposition

doc.description: An attempt was made to memory map a file. The provided disposition is not known.
doc.action: Programmer error; pass a valid disposition to isode_mmap() Notify support@isode.com

message.name: getrlimit
message.arg: The symbolic name for the value being accessed

doc.description: getrlimit failed to read a limit value.
doc.action: If the limit in the process is too small as a result, use ulimit to increase the value for the process prior to running the program

message.name: setrlimit
message.arg: The symbolic name for the value being accessed

doc.description: setrlimit failed to set a limit value.
doc.action: Possibly the required setting is larger than the system's hardcoded limit, or simply that the process has insufficient privilege.

message.name: libraryload
message.arg: The name of the library being loaded

doc.description: An attempt to load a library dynamically failed
doc.action: System configuration error is likely. The library may be searched for on the paths.

doc.description: Finding a symbol in a (dynamically loaded) library failed.
doc.action: Check the log file for details. May be a resource error. If error repeats, investigate system resource issue

doc.description: Unloading a dynamically loaded library failed.
doc.action: If error repeats, investigate possible configuration error

doc.description: The system failed to lock a mutex. This failure represents a significant internal problem for the application.
doc.action: If error repeats, report to Vendor support.

message.name: Twritelock
message.text: Failed to get write lock on %1

doc.description: The system failed to get a write lock. This failure represents a significant internal problem for the application.
doc.action: If error repeats, report to Vendor support.

message.name: Treadlock
message.text: Failed to get read lock on %1

doc.description: The system failed to get a read lock. This failure represents a significant internal problem for the application.
doc.action: If error repeats, report to Vendor support.

doc.description: The system failed to unlock a lock or mutex. This failure represents a significant internal problem for the application.
doc.action: If error repeats, report to Vendor support.

message.name: InvalParam
message.text: invalid parameter in function %1, file %2, line %3, expression %4
message.arg: The line number of the function

doc.description: A call was made to a Windows Runtime Library function which passed an invalid parameter.
doc.action: If error repeats, report to Vendor support.

message.name: license_parse_fail
message.arg: The name of the license file

doc.description: The licensing system has been unable to parse the license file.
doc.action: Check that the specified license file exists and that it is readable.

message.name: license_parse_fail_extra
message.arg: Detail text for license file parse failure

doc.description: Detail on failure to parse license file.
doc.action: See log entry for details. Ensure license file has not been corrupted

doc.description: License authorization failure.
doc.action: Check that the specified license file has not expired, and that it is valid for the application you are running on this system.

doc.description: License authorization successful.
doc.action: No Operator Action

doc.description: Gives date on which license will expire.
doc.action: Check that license is appropriate to system (e.g., evaluation)

doc.description: To use TLS, the OpenSSL library must be Isode's, and to use the full set of cipher suites, the license must contain the appropriate license feature. Something went wrong, so TLS has been disabled.
doc.action: If TLS is desired, notify support@isode.com

doc.description: Only export-level TLS cipher suites are available (those that OpenSSL describes as LOW) are available.
doc.action: If you want to use the full set of cipher suites, you need a new license

doc.description: Normal TLS cipher suites are available (including those that OpenSSL calls MEDIUM and HIGH).
doc.action: No operator action
